dcterms:creator: A. Martínez
R. Benavente
dcterms:description: The original AR database contains over 4,000 color images corresponding to 126 people’s faces with different facial expressions, illumination conditions, and occlusions. A subset containing 3120 images of 120 people was used in the experiments.
dcterms:title: AR face database

dcterms:creator: G. B. Huang
M. Ramesh
T. Berg
E. Learned-Miller
dcterms:description: This database is designed for studying the problem of unconstrained face recognition, containing more than 13,000 face images of 5749 people collected from the web. A subset of 1251 images of 86 categories was used in the experiments.
dcterms:title: Labeled Faces in the Wild (LFW) database

dcterms:creator: T. Sim
S. Baker
M. Bsat
dcterms:description: CMU PIE database contains 41368 images of 68 people under 13 different poses, 43 different illumination conditions, and with 4 different expressions. A subset of 11554 images under five frontal poses was used in the experiments.
dcterms:title: CMU Pose, Illumination, and Expression (CMU PIE) database

dcterms:creator: S. A. Nene
S. K. Nayar
H. Murase
dcterms:description: The COIL20 dataset is a collection of images of 20 objects taken from different angles, containing 72 images per object. The dataset includes two subsets, with the latter subset used for experiments.
dcterms:title: Columbia Object Image Library (COIL20) database
